svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/29.3.0 Chrome/140.0.7339.249 Electron/38.7.2 Safari/537.36" version="29.3.0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="4yV140LwjyB7paJNV9fn"> <mxGraphModel dx="763" dy="571" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-1" parent="1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="Security Architecture" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="380" width="400" x="320" y="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-2" parent="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="Application Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="360" x="20" y="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-3" parent="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-2" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;autosize=1;resizable=0;" value="<ul><li>Password authentication</li><li>Biometric support</li><li>Auto-lock timeout</li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="190" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-6" parent="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="Application Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="360" x="20" y="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-7" parent="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-6" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;autosize=1;resizable=0;" value="<ul><li>AES-256 encryption</li><li>Key derivation (PBKDF2)</li><li>Secure memory handling</li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="200" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-8" parent="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="Licensing Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="360" x="20" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-9" parent="GNtqOF7AoLfktbrz8ocb-8" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;autosize=1;resizable=0;" value="<ul><li>License validation</li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="160" y="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 12px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
